name: Tax Deduction Compliance
des: Ensuring tax deduction compliance is essential for avoiding penalties and maintaining financial integrity in business and personal finances.

name: Tax Payment Services
des: Tax payment services provide convenient and secure methods for individuals and businesses to fulfill their tax obligations to the government.

name: Annual CIT Filing
des: Annual CIT filing is a mandatory requirement for corporations to report their income and pay taxes based on their earnings.

name: Transfer Pricing
des: Transfer pricing refers to the pricing of goods and services between related parties, often used for tax planning and avoidance purposes.

name: Tax preparation
des: Tax companies can help individuals and businesses prepare and file their tax returns accurately and on time.

name: Tax planning
des: Tax companies can provide advice on tax planning strategies to minimize tax liability and maximize savings.

name: Tax resolution
des: Tax companies can assist clients who owe taxes to the IRS or state tax agencies, helping them negotiate payment plans or settle their debts.

name: Audit representation
des: Tax companies can represent clients during an IRS audit, helping to defend against any tax issues that may arise.

name: International tax services
des: Tax companies can help individuals and businesses navigate the complex world of international taxation, including cross-border transactions, transfer pricing, and compliance with foreign tax laws.
